body_html: Checkpoints saved with an absolute path will throw exceptions on load if the checkpoint is moved. I am having trouble coming up with instances where this behavior is desirable. It sounds like there is a work around or a fix in v1.1, but I'll just make sure I use relative paths from now on.

body: Checkpoints saved with an absolute path will throw exceptions on load if the checkpoint is moved. I am having trouble coming up with instances where this behavior is desirable. It sounds like there is a work around or a fix in v1.1, but I'll just make sure I use relative paths from now on.
